summary: A chemical company manager and his secretary are both involved in corruption, sabotage and blackmail, which leads to toxic waste turning corpses into killer zombies.

keywords: female full frontal nudity|female nudity|nudity|sword|full frontal female nudity
director: Director: Pierre B. Reinhard (as Peter B. Harsone)
title: La revanche des mortes vivantes
